items.title: Chelsea's Maresca knocks back Man City rumors
items.summary: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca dismissed as "100% speculation" reports that he could replace Pep Guardiola at Manchester City.

items.title: Amorim: United's next title won't take 10 years
items.summary: Ruben Amorim believes Manchester United will be fighting for the Premier League title far sooner than the 10 or 11 years that Sir Alex Ferguson fears it could take.

items.title: USMNT's Adams out up to 3 months with torn MCL
items.summary: United States international Tyler Adams will be out for up to three months after tearing a medial collateral ligament, Bournemouth coach Andoni Iraola said on Friday.

items.title: Crystal Palace target Brennan Johnson, Maresca on Manchester City links: football ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ All the latest news going into the weekend programme ‚öΩ Premier League: 10 things to look out for | Mail Dom Re the players that have made it to Afcon, this is a handy explainer of the extent to which Premier League teams will be affected. Some of the names not featuring at Afcon are remarkable, and feature some of the most talented footballers from the continent. The main reason for this is that their nation has not qualified (for example, Ghana), but there have also been omissions from squads that have made it (unexpectedly Ivory Coast‚Äôs Simon Adingra, who was voted the best young player at Afcon 2023, providing a fine assist for the winner in the final) and there has even been an unexpected retirement on the eve of the tournament (Nigeria‚Äôs William Troost-Ekong, who was voted the player of the tournament at the last Afcon). items.title: Penaltyheld PSG breekt hand: 'Hij heeft zelf geen idee hoe het gebeurd is'
items.summary: Paris Saint-Germain won woensdag de FIFA Intercontinental Cup en in de finale tegen Flamengo werd keeper Matvey Safonov de grote held. De 26-jarige Rus pakte vier strafschoppen. Vervolgens verging het lachen hem echter snel. Hij liep in die penaltyreeks op uiterst mysterieuze wijze een blessure op.

items.title: Will Afcon 2025 be a defining moment for Morocco?

items.title: Blessure houdt Poku aan de kant in topper tegen Leipzig
items.summary: Bayer Leverkusen-trainer Kasper Hjulmand kan zaterdag niet beschikken over Ernest Poku. De Nederlandse buitenspeler is geblesseerd en moet de topper tegen RB Leipzig aan zich voorbij laten gaan. Zuur voor Leverkusen, die sowieso een volle ziekenboeg hebben.
